attributes.action: Make bus pirority seats disabled only and make it an offence for elderly to block them
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have been finding on a very frequent basis bus pirority seats blocked by pensioners who do not require these seats. The elderly population regurally believe they have entitlement above disabled when this is not the case by law. Also the elderly frequently don't move for the visually impaired and disabled people like myself when they are legally obligied and a fixed penalty notice issued  of say £60 if they don't to force them to comply.
